metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl Ingredients:

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Top with the second slice of bread and cut in half.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Layer the turkey, apple slices, and spinach on top.
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.
2 slices whole grain bread   4 slices turkey breast   1/2 apple, thinly sliced   1/4 cup baby spinach   1 tablespoon mustard or mayo Instructions:   Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread.
o Mix soup, milk, salt, and pepper in a baking dish.
o Toss well and serve.
o Add green beans and half of the fried onions, stir to combine.

Ingredients : o 4 tomatoes o 1 cucumber o 1 small red onion o 1/4 cup olives o 1/4 cup feta cheese o 1/4 cup olive oil o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar o 1 teaspoon oregano o 1 teaspoon salt   Instructions : o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Mix vegetables with olives and crumbled feta cheese.
o Top with remaining fried onions and bake for an additional 5 minutes.

Green Bean Casserole   Ingredients : o 4 cups green beans o 1 can cream of mushroom soup o 1/2 cup milk o 1 cup fried onions o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper   Instructions : o Preheat oven to 350 F (175 C).
o Cook green beans until tender.
o Bake for 25 minutes.
Guacamole   Ingredients : o 3 avocados o 1 lime
In the same pot, sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and diced bell pepper until softened.
Stir in diced tomatoes, chicken broth, rice, paprika, thyme, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add shrimp and cooked chicken and sausage, simmer for an additional 10 minutes until shrimp is cooked and rice is tender.
Cook cubed chicken and sliced sausage until browned, then set aside.
Lamb Curry Ingredients:   1 pound lamb, cubed   1 small onion, diced   2 cloves garlic, minced
Almond Butter and Apple Slices Ingredients:   1 apple, sliced   2 tablespoons almond butter Instructions:   Spread almond butter on each apple slice.
Season with salt and pepper.

1 cup cottage cheese   1/4 cup diced cucumber   1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved   1/4 cup diced bell pepper   Salt and pepper to taste Instructions:   In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper.
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
o Mix vinegar, chicken broth, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper in a bowl.

Ingredients : o 4 potatoes o 1 small onion o 1/4 cup bacon o 1/4 cup vinegar o 1/4 cup chicken broth o 1 tablespoon mustard o 1 teaspoon sugar o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper Instructions: o Boil potatoes until tender, then dice.
o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.
o Serve warm or chilled.
o Form mixture into balls or patties.
o Mix bulgur with ground beef, diced onion, pine nuts, cumin, allspice, and salt.
o Heat oil in a pan and fry meatballs until golden.
o Combine potatoes, bacon, and onion with the dressing.
o Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Form mixture into meatballs.
o Drain on paper towels and serve.

Kibbeh Ingredients: o 1 cup bulgur o 1/2 pound ground beef o 1 small onion o 1/4 cup pine nuts o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon allspice o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying Instructions: o Soak bulgur in water until tender, then drain.
o Heat olive oil in a pan and brown meatballs on all sides.
o Add tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.

Antipasto   Ingredients : o Assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto) o Cheeses (mozzarella, provolone) o Olives o Marinated vegetables (artichokes, peppers) o Breadsticks   Instructions : o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter.
o Form mixture into meatballs.
Arancini   Ingredients : o 2 cups cooked risotto o 1/2 cup mozzarella o 1/2 cup flour o 2 eggs o 1 cup breadcrumbs o 1 cup vegetable oil
Cover with foil and bake for 2.5 hours, basting occasionally with the sauce.
In a bowl, mix honey, soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic, and ginger.
Garnish with green onions and serve.
Remove foil, increase oven to 400 F (200 C), and bake for 15-20 minutes until caramelized.
Season ribs with salt, pepper, and paprika, then place in a baking dish.

2 pounds pork ribs   1/4 cup honey   1/4 cup soy sauce   2 tablespoons rice vinegar   3 cloves garlic, minced   1 teaspoon grated ginger   1 teaspoon paprika   Salt and pepper to taste   Sliced green onions for garnish Instructions:   Preheat oven to 300 F (150 C).

Moroccan Chicken Tagine Ingredients:   4 chicken thighs   1 small onion, diced   2 cloves garlic, minced   1 cup chicken broth   1/2 cup dried apricots, chopped   1/2 cup green olives   1 tablespoon olive oil   1 teaspoon cumin   1 teaspoon cinnamon   1 teaspoon turmeric   Salt and pepper to taste

Ingredients : o 4 cups cubed bread o 4 tomatoes o 1 cucumber o 1 small red onion o 1/4 cup basil o 1/4 cup olive oil o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar o 1 teaspoon salt   Instructions : o Toast bread cubes until golden.
o Toss well and serve.
o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Mix bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and chopped basil.
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Roll dough into thin circles.
o Drain on paper towels and serve.
o Fry in hot oil until crispy.
Papadum   Ingredients : o 1 cup urad dal flour o 1/4 cup water o 1/2 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying   Instructions : o Mix urad dal flour, water, and salt to form a dough.
Patatas Bravas   Ingredients : o 4 potatoes o 1/4 cup olive oil
In the same skillet, sauté diced onion and bell pepper until softened.
Stir in pineapple chunks, ketchup, rice vinegar, soy sauce, and brown sugar.
Return pork to the skillet and toss to coat in the sauce.
Cook pork until browned and crispy, then set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.

Tandoori Chicken Ingredients:   4 boneless, skinless chicken thighs   1 cup yogurt   2 tablespoons lemon juice   2 cloves garlic, minced   1 teaspoon grated ginger   1 teaspoon cumin   1 teaspoon coriander   1 teaspoon turmeric   1 teaspoon paprika   1 teaspoon garam masala
Roll up tightly and repeat with remaining ingredients.
Place a slice of cheese and a few spinach leaves on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.
4 slices turkey breast   4 slices cheese (such as cheddar or Swiss)   1/2 cup baby spinach   1/4 cup hummus Instructions:   Lay a slice of turkey flat and spread with hummus.
o Add ground beef, raisins, almonds, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook until beef is browned.
o Transfer mixture to a baking dish.
o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until softened.

Ingredients : o 1 pound ground beef o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup raisins o 1/4 cup almonds o 1 tablespoon curry powder o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper o 2 eggs o 1/2 cup milk o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs   Instructions : o Preheat oven to 350 F (175 C).
o Beat eggs with milk and pour over the beef mixture.
o Bake for 30 minutes until set and golden.
Bok Choy with Garlic   Ingredients : o 1 pound bok choy
o Rub a baking dish with a cut clove of garlic.
o Mix sesame seeds with soy sauce, sugar, and mirin.
o Toss spinach with dressing and serve.
o Toast sesame seeds and grind them.

Ingredients : o 1 bunch spinach o 2 tablespoons sesame seeds o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 tablespoon sugar o 1 tablespoon mirin   Instructions : o Blanch spinach in boiling water, then rinse in cold water and squeeze out excess moisture.
o Peel and thinly slice potatoes.

Gratin Dauphinois   Ingredients : o 4 potatoes o 1 cup heavy cream o 1/2 cup milk o 2 cloves garlic o 1/2 cup grated Gruyère cheese o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper   Instructions : o Preheat oven to 375 F (190 C).
Spread a thin layer of meat sauce in a baking dish.
Layer with 3 lasagna noodles, 1/3 of the ricotta mixture, 1/3 of the meat sauce, and 1/3 of the shredded mozzarella cheese.

1 pound ground beef   1 small onion, diced   2 cloves garlic, minced   1 packet taco seasoning   1/2 cup water   Taco shells or tortillas Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings Instructions: In a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned.
Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until softened.
Remove foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.
In a skillet, cook ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned.
In a bowl, mix ricotta cheese, egg, grated Parmesan cheese, basil, and oregano.
Stir in marinara sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes.
Serve beef mixture in taco shells or tortillas with desired toppings.
Stir in taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
Lasagna Ingredients: Instructions: Preheat oven to 375 F (190 C).
o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
o Form mixture into balls or patties.
o Mix bulgur with ground beef, diced onion, pine nuts, cumin, allspice, and salt.
o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Heat oil in a pan and fry meatballs until golden.
o Drain on paper towels and serve.
o Form mixture into meatballs.

Kibbeh   Ingredients : o 1 cup bulgur o 1/2 pound ground beef o 1 small onion o 1/4 cup pine nuts o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon allspice o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying   Instructions : o Soak bulgur in water until tender, then drain.
Layer with shredded carrots, cucumber, spinach, and bell pepper.
1 cup cottage cheese   1/2 cup fresh berries   1 tablespoon honey Instructions:   In a bowl, combine cottage cheese and fresh berries.
Slice in half and serve.
Roll up the tortilla tightly.

Veggie Wrap Ingredients:   1 large whole wheat tortilla   1/4 cup hummus   1/4 cup shredded carrots   1/4 cup sliced cucumber   1/4 cup baby spinach   1/4 cup sliced bell pepper Instructions:   Spread hummus on the tortilla.

Almond Butter Banana Toast Ingredients:   2 slices whole grain bread, toasted   2 tablespoons almond butter   1 banana, sliced   1 teaspoon chia seeds Instructions:   Spread almond butter on the toasted bread.
o Mix bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and chopped basil.
o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, and salt in a bowl.
o Grill or broil until golden, turning occasionally.
o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Toss well and serve.

Ingredients : o 1 pound paneer o 1/2 cup yogurt o 1 tablespoon lemon juice o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon garam masala o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 teaspoon salt o Skewers Instructions: o Cut paneer into cubes.

Panzanella Ingredients: o 4 cups cubed bread o 4 tomatoes o 1 cucumber o 1 small red onion o 1/4 cup basil o 1/4 cup olive oil o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar o 1 teaspoon salt Instructions: o Toast bread cubes until golden.
o Add paneer cubes and marinate for at least 1 hour.
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Roll dough into thin circles.
o Drain on paper towels and serve.
o Fry in hot oil until crispy.
o Thread paneer onto skewers.
Papadum Ingredients: o 1 cup urad dal flour o 1/4 cup water o 1/2 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying Instructions: o Mix urad dal flour, water, and salt to form a dough.
Patatas Bravas Ingredients: o 4 potatoes o 1/4 cup olive oil
Stuff the mixture into the chicken pockets and secure with toothpicks if needed.
Mix barbecue sauce, chicken broth, and brown sugar, and pour over pork.
In a bowl, mix spinach, feta, sun-dried tomatoes, and garlic.
Shred pork with forks and mix with sauce.

2 pounds pork shoulder   1 small onion, sliced   2 cloves garlic, minced Salt and pepper to taste Buns for serving Coleslaw for topping (optional) Instructions: Season pork shoulder with salt, pepper, and smoked paprika.
Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours until pork shreds easily.
Place onion and garlic in a slow cooker, then add pork.
Transfer to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes until cooked through.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and sear chicken on both sides.
Serve on buns with coleslaw if desired.
Cut a pocket into each chicken breast.
Stuffed Chicken Breasts Ingredients: Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: Preheat oven to 375 F (190 C).
Season chicken with salt and pepper.
In the same skillet, sauté diced onion and minced garlic until fragrant.
Return beef to the skillet and pour sauce over the top.
Add broccoli florets and stir-fry until tender.
Chicken Fajitas Ingredients:   1 pound chicken breast, sliced   1 bell pepper, sliced   1 small onion, sliced   2 tablespoons fajita seasoning
Cook sliced beef until browned, then set aside.
In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.
Cook until sauce is thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.
Fill with cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, and spinach.

1 whole wheat pita bread   1/2 cup hummus   1/2 cup cucumber, sliced   1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced   1/4 cup shredded carrots   1/4 cup baby spinach Instructions:   Cut the pita bread in half to create pockets.
Spread hummus inside each pocket.
o Mix vegetables with chopped parsley and mint.

Ingredients : o 2 cups cassava flour o 1/4 cup butter o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup bacon o 1/4 cup parsley o 1 teaspoon salt   Instructions : o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic in butter until crispy.
o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, sumac, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Toss well and serve.
o Stir in chopped parsley and salt.
Fava   Ingredients : o 1 cup yellow split peas o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 1 teaspoon salt
o Add cassava flour and cook, stirring constantly, until golden.

Fattoush   Ingredients : o 2 pita breads o 4 tomatoes o 1 cucumber o 1 small red onion o 1/4 cup parsley o 1/4 cup mint o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon sumac o 1 teaspoon salt   Instructions : o Toast pita breads until crispy, then break into pieces.
